      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled(Messages messages)
        Description copied from interface: Driver
        Determines if the driver is enabled.

        The messages argument is optionally used for the driver to report back any messages or exceptions that prevent the driver from being enabled.

        Specified by:
        isEnabled in interface Driver<PostGISWorkspace>

      • name

        public String name()
        Description copied from interface: Driver
        Name identifying the driver.

        This name should be no more than a few words (ideally one). It isn't meant to be a description but should be human readable.

        Specified by:
        name in interface Driver<PostGISWorkspace>

      • canOpen

        public boolean canOpen(Map<?,Object> opts,
              Messages msgs)
        Description copied from interface: Driver
        Determines if this driver can open a connection to the data described by the specified options.

        The messages list is optionally used for the driver to report back any messages or exceptions that prevent the driver from opening the specified data source.

        Specified by:
        canOpen in interface Driver<PostGISWorkspace>
        Parameters:
        opts - Options describing the data.
        msgs - Messages reported from the driver, optionally null.
        Returns:
        True if the driver can open the data, otherwise false.

      • open

        public PostGISWorkspace open(Map<?,Object> opts)
                      throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Driver
        Opens a connection to data described by the specified options.
        Specified by:
        open in interface Driver<PostGISWorkspace>
        Parameters:
        opts - Options describing the data to connect to.
        Returns:
        The data.
        Throws:
        IOException - In the event of a connection error such as a file system error or database connection failure.
